00019 SimpleRenderable::SimpleRenderable(const string& name)
00020 {
00021     this->name = name;
00022     sprite = NULL;

00025 SimpleRenderable::~SimpleRenderable()
00026 {
00027     if (sprite != NULL)
00028         delete sprite;
00029     removeAllUsers();
00030     removeFromRenderOriginators();
00031 }

00033 void SimpleRenderable::setSprite(const string& spriteName)
00034 {
00035     if (ScriptManager::get()->getResourceManager()->GetSprite(spriteName.c_str()) == 0)
00036             Utils::get()->writeToLog("Error, cannot load Sprite [" + spriteName + "]");
00037     else
00038     {
00039         if (sprite != NULL)
00040             delete sprite;
00041         sprite = new hgeSprite(*ScriptManager::get()->getResourceManager()->GetSprite(spriteName.c_str()));
00042         sprite->SetHotSpot(getWidth() / 2, getHeight() / 2);
00043     }
00044 }
00045 
00046 void SimpleRenderable::setTexture(const string& name)
00047 {
00048     if (ScriptManager::get()->getResourceManager()->GetTexture(name.c_str()) == 0)
00049         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Error, cannot load Texture [" + name + "]");
00050     else
00051         {
00052                 if (sprite != NULL)
00053                 {
00054                         sprite->SetTexture(ScriptManager::get()->getResourceManager()->GetTexture(name.c_str()));
00055                         sprite->SetHotSpot(getWidth() / 2, getHeight() / 2);
00056                 }
00057                 else
00058                 {
00059                         sprite = new hgeSprite(ScriptManager::get()->getResourceManager()->GetTexture(name.c_str()), 0, 0, 128, 128);
00060                         sprite->SetHotSpot(getWidth() / 2, getHeight() / 2);
00061                 }
00062         }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void SimpleRenderable::setTexture(const int& handle, const float& x, const float& y, const float& width, const float& height)
00066 {
00067     if (sprite != NULL)
00068     {
00069         sprite->SetTexture(handle);
00070         sprite->SetTextureRect(x, y, width, height);
00071     }
00072     else
00073         sprite = new hgeSprite(ScriptManager::get()->getResourceManager()->GetTexture(name.c_str()), x, y, width, height);
00074     sprite->SetHotSpot(getWidth() / 2, getHeight() / 2);
00075 }
00076 
00077 int SimpleRenderable::getTexture()
00078 {
00079     if (sprite != NULL)
00080         return sprite->GetTexture();
00081     else
00082         return 0;
00083 }

00088         sprite->GetTextureRect(u, v, width, height);

00092 {
00093     if (sprite != NULL)
00094         sprite->SetTextureRect(u, v, width, height, adjustSize);

00116 hgeColor SimpleRenderable::getColor()
00117 {
00118     if (sprite != NULL)
00119         return hgeColor(sprite->GetColor());
00120     return hgeColor(0, 0, 0, 0);

00137 void SimpleRenderable::render(SceneNode* const node, const hgeVector& screenPosition, Camera* const cam)
00138 {
00139     if (sprite != NULL)
00140     {
00141         sprite->SetZ(node->getZ());
00142         sprite->RenderEx(screenPosition.x, screenPosition.y, -Utils::get()->angleRadians(node->getWorldRotation()), node->getWorldScale(), node->getWorldScale());
00143     }
00144 }
